messages.msgSnippet: Thanks so much for the link, I LOVED those, and my daughter adores learning things thru song (she s working on the states and capitals now from an old
messages.messageBody:
Thanks so much for the link, I LOVED those, and my daughter adores
learning things thru song (she's working on the states and capitals now
from an old animaniacs episode).

sally

wrote:

>

> web page specifically mentions teachers, and they said it was valid for
> us

>
> Kevin

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Schoolhouse Rock discount offer
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/11/2002 1:36:46 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Yes! I ordered mine yesterday and answered homeschool when they asked the name of the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/11/2002 1:36:46 PM Eastern Standard Time,
kevin.tucker@... writes:


> I called and asked if the offer was available to homeschoolers, since the
> web page specifically mentions teachers, and they said it was valid for us
> also.
>

Yes! I ordered mine yesterday and answered "homeschool" when they asked the
name of the school I teach at. No problems at all.
Amy Kagey
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=462366"> </A>U<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=462366">sborne Books Online Catalog</A>

there is no path and leave a trail."
- Ralph Waldo Emerson

messages.subject: Schoolhouse Rock discount offer
messages.msgSnippet: Just thought I d pass this on.  You can get the School Rock collection for 50% by ordering direct from Disney.  The following URL gives details and a phone #
messages.messageBody:
Just thought I'd pass this on. You can get the School Rock collection for
50% by ordering direct from Disney. The following URL gives details and a
phone #

http://disney.go.com/disneyvideos/preschool/schoolhouserock/teacher.html

The phone # to call is 1-888-253-9100

I called and asked if the offer was available to homeschoolers, since the
web page specifically mentions teachers, and they said it was valid for us
also.

Kevin
